mapper.insert: insert into tbl_rule (ruleId, trackId, basic, applied, industry) values (#{ruleId}, #{trackId}, #{basic}, #{applied}, #{industry})
mapper.select:
select
ruleId, trackId, basic, applied, industry from tbl_rule where ruleNo = #{ruleNo}
mapper.update: update tbl_rule set trackId=#{trackId}, ruleId=#{ruleId}, basic=#{basic}, applied=#{applied}, industry=#{industry} where ruleNo=#{ruleNo}
mapper.select: select tr.ruleNo, tu.univTitle, tt.trackTitle, tr.ruleId, tr.trackId, tr.basic, tr.applied, tr.industry from tbl_rule as tr JOIN tbl_track as tt ON tt.trackNo = tr.trackId JOIN tbl_univ as tu ON tt.univNO = tu.univNo order by trackId asc
